entry.source: It is I, Abbot Hugo from the Monastery.{F801}Among the relics, there is a certain magical{F801}box that may immensely increase our calculating{F801}abilities. According to the old documents, it{F801}is known as a {F804,5}PC.{F804,0} Please find one of these{F801}for the betterment of our country.{F801}
